pages.text: Legends say that long ago the curious creatures known as $(thing)Pigmen$(), driven by their love of gold, attempted to rob our world of all ore, causing a cataclysm in the process, and reducing themselves to this zombified state. They can be found roaming the $(thing)Nether$(), and are peaceful unless attacked.
